column5: Got out to Cooch today to test the boat out for the 08 season.  Ended up fishing around some marinas for perch.  Landed about 200 between us and kept 20 for the pan.
Note: 13 of the 20 perch I kept had little white worms in the flesh.  Not for me thank you, too bad, I hate wasting fish.

I find this to be a problem with the perch in Cooch. I stick to Simcoe. I've been at the fest for 8 days now and never bother with Cooch because of this reason. You do get Perch in Simcoe also with worms, but not as many.  Other bad news, we caught a Goby in the Narrows last week.   we turned it into Tudhope park.
